name: CANOE MANUFACTURING COMPANY and Robert Ullman v. Joseph H. JONES, Esquire and Williamson, Friedberg & Jones. Petition of Robert Ullman

parties: CANOE MANUFACTURING COMPANY and Robert Ullman v. Joseph H. JONES, Esquire and Williamson, Friedberg & Jones. Petition of Robert Ullman.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 24th day of October, 2011, the Application to File Supplement to Petition for Allowance of Appeal, the Petition for Allowance to Correct a One-Word Error in the May 27, 2011 Petition for Allowance of Appeal, and the Petition for Allowance of Appeal are hereby DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
30 A.3d 1101
CANOE MANUFACTURING COMPANY and Robert Ullman v. Joseph H. JONES, Esquire and Williamson, Friedberg & Jones. Petition of Robert Ullman.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 24, 2011.
